item.title: Hello World
item.description: Happy Halloween ðŸŽƒ ðŸ¦‡ ðŸ‘» Obligatory first post while getting everything set up, as you’ve probably seen in the blog footer this website is powered by Hugo with the Hugo-Coder theme and is hosted on GitHub. It’s really nice not having to worry about stylesheets and layouts because I have close to zero design skills and being able to just write stuff in Markdown is great. Not really sure why I wanted to start a blog ðŸ¤” but here we are.
